channel.title: Anybody play golf here?
channel.description:
This is probably the last place to ask. But I'm pretty desperate to fix my swing. I can't figure out why I'm sliceing my driver a little bit. I thought it was my down swing. But it's on the right angle. I was told my balance is off, but it's just fine. I can upload another video if you need another angle.
http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=zj72mv&s=3
So if you know anything about golf, I'd appreciate help. :)

item.title: Anybody play golf here?
item.dc:creator: @ninja_nub ninja nub
item.description:
@ninja_nub wrote:

ThAt0n36Uy:

Hey, if you like men, that’s fine and all. You don’t need and try to make me come out of some non-existent closet. I’m straight OK? I’m sure you’ll find the right man someday.

I’m straight, you’re straight, end of story.

Let’s get back on topic to talking about rods, balls, and dirty holes … srsly.

Read full topic

item.title: Anybody play golf here?
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

[quote=“ninja nub, post:20, topic:205218”][quote author=ThAt0n36Uy link=topic=270869.msg2222062#msg2222062 date=1210582975]
I enjoy playing golf, but I don’t have some sort of fetish. The game is entertaining. More of a leisurely thing for me to do, rather than play for sport.
[/quote]

So you’re … not gay?[/quote]

Lets keep on-topic :p. I flatened my swing out a bit, to keep on plane. I’ll see if it works at practice tommorow.

Th4t0n36uy, please don’t post in here…I didn’t want this to turn into an arguement.

Read full topic

item.title: Anybody play golf here?
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

[quote=“pk4pk, post:10, topic:205218”][quote author=ninja nub link=topic=270869.msg2221954#msg2221954 date=1210575254]

I’ll try to be a bit more specific to help you out.

It looks like you’re holding the club a bit farther down then your supposed to. Try lifting it up using the end of the club as an axis (Rotate). Obviously not while swinging :P.

Yeah, that’s coventional golf. If I remember, there was a program where you start off on that diagonal plane; in your setup.

Then you stay on that plane all the way through your swing. It’ll cause you to lose yardage, but it helps you control the ball.

Try balancing both. To get yardage and control.

Shit mpsc legend has joined.

I bow to you.

I don’t play but maybe take lessons.

  1. Don’t worship popular online people.
  2. He is just as normal as everyone else, so treat him as one, not a celebrity.
  3. Mscp is whole different community, we could care less who is famous over there.
  4. Don’t point out the obvious. I’m pretty sure he would be taking some form of lessons.
    [/quote]
    If you haven’t figured it out by now, it was sarcasm. I don’t worship mpsc’ers or mitb’ers or how ever the fuck you spell it.[/quote]

I’ve been here many times before. Go through my posts if you wish to see.

Read full topic

item.title: Anybody play golf here?
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

[quote=“chrisn2323, post:11, topic:205218”]I play, its fucking hard but fun as hell

Yeah I have a slice too.

I like putting and pitching and chipping. My short game is my best.[/quote]

Then we have something in common :). My short game is what saves me. I average high 20s in putts a game. I get up and down a lot.

item.title: Anybody play golf here?
item.dc:creator: @ninja_nub ninja nub
item.description:
@ninja_nub wrote:

Funny thing is, I don’t play golf. I just know a lot about since I live right next to a golf course. And now looking at the video, I see what you mean about your hips. Good luck with golf.

Off-topic: Did you quit coding Zdiddy reborn?

Read full topic

item.title: Anybody play golf here?
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

[quote=“pk4pk, post:6, topic:205218”]Shit mpsc legend has joined.

I bow to you.

I don’t play but maybe take lessons.[/quote]

I did expect somebody to say something, but it happens I guess.

Chiz, my coach told me it was my hips. My balance is a little off, thus making the ball to slice a bit. I’m not rotating my hips enough, and it’s making the ball slice. Also, I haven’t had a lesson is over three years :p. Just help here and there, but it’s mainly on my own.

Read full topic
